subject: Swine Influenza
Stadiums and Arenas
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fans will be back in the stands for this weekend’s games in Mexico. Only players, reporters and officials were allowed inside last week because of the swine flu. But under guidelines by the Mexican Football Federation, every other seat and every other row in stadiums will remain empty. Families will be allowed to sit together.
